    Aggregate

    aggregate is a sub-meetup of the Portland R Meetup group.

    These meetups are a smaller group of people, usually a dozen or so people.

    Itâ€™s a more intimate group, ideal for actually meeting people, getting help with your code, sharing stories, and networking.
